      • createInDB

        protected void createInDB(Insert _insert)
                   throws InstallationException
        Appends to the update the SQL table specific attribute values to the _insert.
        Overrides:
        createInDB in class AbstractUpdate.AbstractDefinition
        Parameters:
        _insert - insert instance to append SQL table specific attributes
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if insert of the eFaps definition for the SQL table failed

      • updateInDB

        public void updateInDB(UpdateLifecycle _step,
              Set<AbstractUpdate.Link> _allLinkTypes)
                throws InstallationException
        Specific update instructions for the update for SQL tables. Depending on the life cycle _step following is done:
        Life Cycle StepDescription
        SQL_CREATE_TABLE
        SQL_UPDATE_ID
        SQL_UPDATE_TABLE
        SQL_RUN_SCRIPT
        EFAPS_UPDATE
        Overrides:
        updateInDB in class AbstractUpdate.AbstractDefinition
        Parameters:
        _step - current life cycle update step
        _allLinkTypes - all link types
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if update failed
        See Also:
        createSQLTable(), updateColIdSQLTable(), updateSQLTable(), executeSQLs()

      • removeObsoleteEvents

        Parameters:

        _eventInstList - list of valid event Instances

        EFapsException - on error

      • executeSQLs

        protected void executeSQLs()
                    throws InstallationException
        Execute defined SQL statements in the database.
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if SQL scripts could not be executed
        See Also:
        sqls, updateInDB(org.efaps.update.UpdateLifecycle, java.util.Set<org.efaps.update.AbstractUpdate.Link>)

      • createSQLTable

        protected void createSQLTable()
                       throws EFapsException
        If the SQL table does not exists in the database, create the SQL table.
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if create of the SQL tables failed
        See Also:
        updateInDB(UpdateLifecycle, Set)

      • updateColIdSQLTable

        protected void updateColIdSQLTable()
                            throws EFapsException,
                                   InstallationException
        Update the column ID of SQL table in the database. The column ID must be auto increment or defined as foreign key to another SQL table (if parent SQL table name is defined in the XML configuration item file).
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if update of the SQL tables failed
        InstallationException - if update of the SQL tables failed
        See Also:
        updateInDB(UpdateLifecycle, Set)

      • updateSQLTable

        protected void updateSQLTable()
                       throws InstallationException
        Update the SQL table in the database.
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if update of the SQL tables failed
        See Also:
        updateInDB(UpdateLifecycle, Set)
